title: Symphonie mechanique
creator_credit: Jean Mitry, P.H. Lifchitz, Anatole Dauman and Argos Films
brief_description: In this short experimental piece, Jean Mitry combined shots of industrial machinery with a contemporary score creating a poetic rhythm between image and sound featuring a score by French composer Pierre Boulez entitled ‘Musique Concrete’.
creator_credit_for_label: Jean Mitry, P.H. Lifchitz, Anatole Dauman and Argos Films
description: In this short experimental piece, Jean Mitry combined shots of industrial machinery with a contemporary score creating a poetic rhythm between image and sound featuring a score by French composer Pierre Boulez entitled ‘Musique Concrete’.
